article_title: Senate Banking Committee Approves First Nominee This Congress
article_text:
WASHINGTON—The Senate Banking Committee on Thursday approved the nomination of a Treasury Department official, marking the first nomination vote since the current Congress took office in early 2015.

The official, Adam Szubin, was approved by a 14-8 vote to the post of undersecretary in charge of combating terrorism and financial crimes. He is now serving in that post in an acting capacity. His nomination will now move to the Senate...

article_summary:
WASHINGTON—The Senate Banking Committee on Thursday approved the nomination of a Treasury Department official, marking the first nomination vote since the current Congress took office in early 2015.
The official, Adam Szubin, was approved by a 14-8 vote to the post of undersecretary in charge of combating terrorism and financial crimes.
His nomination will now move to the Senate...
He is now serving in that post in an acting capacity.
